title: Data breaches are everywhere and consequences are ???
description:
Companies lose your data and then nothing happens. Emily Stewart, senior reporter for Vox, explains. 
Read Emily’s story: https://www.vox.com/the-goods/23031858/data-breach-data-loss-personal-consequences
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan, engineered by Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
